author: Lakshmi Varanasi
title: Figure AI founder Brett Adcock says there will soon be as many humanoid robots as humans
description: "It's literally going to feel like a sci-fi movie," Figure AI founder Brett Adcock says.
content:
Large numbers of humanoid robots are on the way, Figure AI founder Brett Adcock says.Andrey Suslov/Getty Images
